short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Press the button to generate a random affirmation phrase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a random new daily affirmation. The user is able to select their preferred pronouns. This tool is for those who like to reassure themselves.
